text: Clayton Heath (born February 15, 1951) is an American former professional football running back who played in the National Football League (NFL) in 1976 for the Miami Dolphins and Buffalo Bills. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1951 births Category:American football running backs Category:Buffalo Bills players Category:Miami Dolphins players Category:Wake Forest Demon Deacons football players Category:People from Chester County, South Carolina
title: Clayton Heath
